title: How has Donald Trump tried to rewrite history? - Quora
tags: Political History of the United States of America
Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: By ditching the Johnson Act and enabling churches to go tax free even when they preach politics. By making enemies of allies and sucking up to dictators who shouldn't be trusted. By trying to by-pass both of the other branches of government. By declaring the free press an enemy of the people. Oh, why do we bother with this anymore? Did someone just wake up?

Has Donald Trump tried to rewrite history? Which bit of history did he change? Was his new history patch eloquent and well researched? Or did he just do a slipshod job like he did with the Miss Universe pagent?
